text: Alfredo Ramos dos Santos (born 1 January, 1920 - 23 October, 1997), best known as Alfredo II, is a former Brazilian football player. He has played for Brazil national team. ==Honours== ;Vasco da Gama *Campeonato Carioca: 1945, 1947, 1949, 1950, 1952 *Campeonato Sul-Americano de Campeões: 1948 *Torneio Octogonal Rivadavia Correa Meyer: 1953 ;Brazil *Copa América runner-up: 1945, 1953 *FIFA World Cup runner-up: 1950 ==References== Category:1920 births Category:Footballers from Rio de Janeiro Category:1950 FIFA World Cup players Category:1997 deaths Category:Association football midfielders
title: Alfredo II
